website_summaries.verdict: Compares with professional-grade knives in terms of quality and durability.
pros: Ice-hardened blade gives set lasting sharpness
Can fit easily into most knife blocks
Buyers appreciated its superior control and secure feel when in hand
cons: One of the more expensive sets, but worth it if you want the knives to last for years to come

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding carving knife and fork.
customer_reviews.text: The wife asked for new knives for the kitchen. After much research I chose this set to go along with: Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Pro S 7-Piece Knife Set with Block. I am a big fan of Victorinox products. I bought a set of Victorinox 4-3/4-Inch Straight-Edge Pointed-Tip Steak Knife, Set of 6 with Rosewood Handles along with a Mercer Culinary Genesis 8-Inch Forged Bread Knife to round out the set. She is thrilled with the quality of these products
customer_reviews.author: coach georgeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this set. very very sharp, the fork is as sharp as the knive. Would recommend this product as it is a high quality set and will last for generations if takin care of hand wash ONLY, don't put in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Robert La Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: carving knife set
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and the recipient says it works great. It's a knife and a fork to hold the meat in place, and it does what it's supposed to do with good ergonomics. It should be normal for a product to work like it should, but it's a pleasant surprise when that's actually the case.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Made well and are top of the line.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the two items. They are used almost daily and are excellent. Completed a set that is top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: omaomaoma

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Henckels
customer_reviews.text: Got this to go with our other four star knives. A pretty good value compared to buying individually. Carving fork is sturdy. 8" carving knife looks just like our 6" chef's knife, just longer.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Henkels Professional S knives and love
customer_reviews.text: I use only Zwilling J.A. Henkels Professional S knives and love them
customer_reviews.author: IamMe

customer_reviews.title: This set is a thing of beauty
customer_reviews.text: The carving knife is OK and works well for both poultry and beef/pork roasts. The real thing of beauty is the carving fork!!!! After using normal(??) carving forks with tines that are 3-4" in length, the long tines on this fork is an absolute joy to work with. If you do not particularly care for the knife, buy the set for the fork, and relegate the knife to your junk drawer. I have never had a carving fork before like this, it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my son and wife like it, slices and handles well. There very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Exelent
customer_reviews.text: It is an exelent product, I always buy J.A. Henckels, make my work easy I love it and my husbad too
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Well-made carving set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for son-in-law. He is very fond of these knives.
customer_reviews.author: Cita Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Well made carving set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as gift for my husband. He loved them. They are very well made. He wished the knife blade was longer but we have not been able to find a well made set with longer knife. We totally recommend this set
customer_reviews.author: K. Hat

customer_reviews.title: Sharp & high quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand Bought to replace a 26 year old carver
customer_reviews.author: Anjel B Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Knives are perfect. Wish they came with case or box.
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: ZWILLING J.A. HENCKELS top quality knife but don't put in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: We love the knives in this range and have been collecting them for years and years. The knives last really well, just DON'T put in the dishwasher - the handles can crack. They need to be washed by hand. It's a small effort for an excellent quality knife.
customer_reviews.author: Bekki

customer_reviews.title: These knives are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I carved a whole turkey with this set and they are still in one piece! Seriously though, I have had several of these knives for years and they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carving set for my husband's birthday. He used it for the first time last night, to slice Eye Round. IT SLICED RIGHT THROUGH THE MEAT, LIKE IT WAS BUTTER!! Product is great, but the price is high. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GoosFan95

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I can carve a turkey
customer_reviews.text: I have read many instructions on carving a turkey and I could never achieve nice slices. Now I can. Turns out I knew what I was doing I just did not have the proper tools. This carving set, with it's very sharp knife and strong fork, is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: tpentek

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  For the chef with a desire for a lighter knife
customer_reviews.text: Henckels makes a great knife and this set represents a great value. If you like a heavier knife, go with a Wustof. If you favor a lighter set, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R. Spande

product_meta.title: ZWILLING J.A. Henckels Professional S Carving Set, 2-piece, Black/Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:2-piece| Color:Black/Stainless SteelProfessional "s" are the classic knives for the professional kitchen. The knives are made of proprietary special formula steel that has been perfected for over 280 years. Combined with zwilling's signature ice-hardening technique, these friodur blades are harder, sharper, they will not stain or chip and they retain their sharpness longer. honed and hand-finished by the most skilled artisans, the knives' laser-controlled edge is incredibly sharp. The sturdy bolster provides the right balance and acts as a finger guard. Precision-forged from a single piece of solid steel, these three rivet handle knives deliver optimum balance and safe handling. Professional chefs worldwide trust the tradition and quality of these impressive knives.
feature_bullets: Special formula high carbon NO STAIN steel
SIGMAFORGE knife is forged from a single piece of solid steel
Ice-hardened FRIODUR blade starts sharper stays sharper longer and has superior resilience
Precision-honed blade and laser-controlled edge ensures ideal cutting angle for sharpness and durability
Ergonomic polymer three-rivet handle is perfectly bonded to the full tang

specifications.Customer Reviews: 5.0 out of 5 stars38 ratings5.0 out of 5 stars
